subject: Football
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: The injury sustained by the Jets’ kicker, Mike Nugent, trains the spotlight on N.F.L. specialists, who operate on the fringe of teams, in near anonymity, at least until they make mistakes.
snippet: The injury sustained by the Jets’ kicker, Mike Nugent, trains the spotlight on N.F.L. specialists, who operate on the fringe of teams, in near anonymity, at least until they make mistakes.
